argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | drngunz.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) |
| 2 |  | drngunz.u | |- .1. = ( 1r ` R ) |
| 3 |  | #P_drngring | |- ( R e. DivRing -> R e. Ring ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Unit ` R ) = ( Unit ` R ) |
| 5 | 4, 2 | #P_1unit | |- ( R e. Ring -> .1. e. ( Unit ` R ) ) |
| 6 | 3, 5 | #P_syl | |- ( R e. DivRing -> .1. e. ( Unit ` R ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` R ) |
| 8 | 7, 4, 1 | #P_drngunit | |- ( R e. DivRing -> ( .1. e. ( Unit ` R ) <-> ( .1. e. ( Base ` R ) /\ .1. =/= .0. ) ) ) |
| 9 | 6, 8 | #P_mpbid | |- ( R e. DivRing -> ( .1. e. ( Base ` R ) /\ .1. =/= .0. ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_simprd | |- ( R e. DivRing -> .1. =/= .0. ) |
